title: Listening & Grammar Focus
description: Specialized test for listening and grammar skills

questions.question: Choose the correct tense: 'By next year, I _____ my degree.'
Select the right preposition: 'She is good _____ mathematics.'
Find the error: 'Each of the boys have their own book.'
Repeat: 'Dedication and perseverance lead to achievement.'
Repeat: 'Critical thinking skills are essential for problem-solving.'

questions.story: Renewable energy sources like solar and wind power are becoming increasingly important. They help reduce carbon emissions and provide sustainable alternatives to fossil fuels.

mcqs.question: What are examples of renewable energy sources mentioned?
What do renewable energy sources help reduce?
What do they provide alternatives to?

questions.question: Correct: 'The team have decided to change their strategy.'
questions.correctAnswer: The team has decided to change its strategy.

questions.question: Correct: 'Between you and I, this is confidential.'
questions.correctAnswer: Between you and me, this is confidential.

questions.question: A train travels 60 km in 45 minutes. What is its speed in km/hr?
